mapper.select: SELECT database_id databaseId, business_name businessName, db_type dbType, db_name dbName, user_name userName, user_password userPassword, server_address serverAddress, server_port serverPort, db_status dbStatus, db_remark dbRemark, db_charset dbCharset, table_count tableCount, error_msg errorMsg FROM res_database LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
